articles.title: Social media erupts over man's heartfelt ode to his beloved ‚Äòyellow pillow'
articles.summary: Lily Li, CEO of Hygea, suggests preventative measures like washing hair, removing makeup before bed, and using pillow protectors to keep pillows clean. She also advises using stain removal spray or baking soda paste for smaller stains and a detergent/soap combination for stubborn stains. Regular washing, at least twice a year, is recommended to minimize yellow stains.

articles.title: Amazon's AWS has joined the AI agent craze. Now the real work of showing Fortune 500 companies how to actually use them begins
articles.author: Jason Del Rey
articles.summary: Amazon Web Services (AWS) has launched Agentcore, a suite of services and tools for building and deploying AI agents. These agents are designed to automate internal tasks and overhaul consumer interactions with online businesses. The aim of AWS is to enable companies to leverage AI to automate processes and improve efficiency.

articles.title: Officials to break ground Friday on new Kroger site
articles.author: Dennis George
articles.summary: Kroger is launching a new Kroger Marketplace store in Elizabethtown. The new store will include a drive-through pharmacy. The store will offer services, including online ordering and grocery pickup.

articles.title: Neon Abyss 2 is now available in Early Access!
articles.author: Criticologos
articles.summary: Veewo Games has launched Neon Abyss 2 in Early Access on Steam. The game features 4-player online co-op, a revolutionary weapon system allowing players to wield various weapons, unlimited item synergies for creating unique builds, and the return of Hatchmons.

articles.title: Samsung, Glo Reward Preorders With ‚Ç¶1.2m Freebies, Data Bonuses
articles.author: Royal Ibeh
articles.summary: Samsung and Globacom have partnered to reward Nigerian consumers who pre-ordered the newly launched Galaxy Z Fold7 and Galaxy Z Flip7 smartphones. The reward package includes Samsung Care+, luxury gift items, and a raffle draw with prizes such as a 65-inch Samsung television. Globacom is offering these devices exclusively at its retail outlets across Nigeria.

articles.title: Planning To Travel More This Year? Check Out These 33 Products
articles.author: Daniel Boan
articles.summary: Merit introduces The Minimalist Perfecting Complexion Stick, a dual foundation and concealer product. Subtl launches Beauty Stack, a stackable set of cream and powder makeup essentials. Neutrogena offers a pack of makeup remover towelettes for travel convenience. I Dew Care presents dry shampoo powder with a powder-puff applicator.

articles.title: Why everyone's obsessed with this ‚Äòboring' skin care brand
articles.author: Cody Kline
articles.summary: CeraVe launched a marketing campaign positioning itself as the "G.O.A.T." (Greatest Of All Time), featuring a goat named Sarah V. This campaign utilizes a "medutainment" approach, blending humor and pop culture to educate consumers about skincare. CeraVe's strategy focuses on being useful and smart, appealing to younger consumers who value both entertainment and education.

articles.title: Walmart Releases Health-Conscious Spin on Classic PB & J Sandwiches
articles.author: The Capital Journal
articles.summary: Walmart launched a new, healthier version of the traditional peanut butter and jelly sandwich. The new product is driving increased shopper traffic to Walmart stores nationwide.

articles.title: How Indian startups are powering the sustainability push
articles.author: TIMESOFINDIA.COM
articles.summary: Several startups are launching new sustainable products and services. Gud Gum is introducing biodegradable chewing gum, TurnS Intelligent Apparel focuses on eco-friendly clothing, and Bare Future creates solar-dried snacks. Other startups mentioned include Earthful with plant-based supplements, Packmate with recycled paper notebooks, and Vayve Mobility with the Eva electric car.

articles.title: ChatGPT will soon shop online, make PowerPoints on your behalf
articles.author: Rachel Metz
articles.summary: OpenAI is introducing new options for ChatGPT to perform complex tasks. The updated ChatGPT will include an AI agent designed to streamline personal and professional projects. It can plan meals, order ingredients, and create presentations.

articles.title: Dryer Balls Reviewers Ditched Dryer Sheets For
articles.author: Lourdes Avila Uribe
articles.summary: Wool dryer balls, made with high-quality New Zealand wool, replace fabric softener and dryer sheets. They can speed up drying time by lifting and separating laundry, which can also help save on energy costs while leaving clothes fluffy, soft and static-free. A particular brand is sold on Amazon.

articles.title: GigaCloud Technology Inc Brings Curated Showroom Spotlighting Strategic Brand Partnerships to 2025 Summer Las Vegas Market  Jul. 17, 2025 20:00
articles.summary: GigaCloud Technology Inc. announced its participation in the Las Vegas Market showcasing its signature product lines alongside partner products, including Christopher Knight Home's modern signature collection, Purple Innovation's integrated partnership supported by GigaCloud's SFR model, and new product offerings from partners like Zinus (Dreamvibe line), Nubba Sleep (exclusive mattress line), Instant Comfort (adjustable smart beds), and House & Home (upholstered beds).

articles.title: PubMatic Launches AI-Powered Live Sports Marketplace with Real-Time Game Moment Curation, FanServ Joins as Premier Partner  Jul. 17, 2025 20:00
articles.summary: PubMatic has launched an AI-powered Live Sports Marketplace that enables advertisers to target specific game moments across streaming platforms in real-time, offering granular event-level curation and real-time access to premium live sports ad inventory. The Live Sports Marketplace launches with FanServ as its premier partner, providing access to premium NBA, WNBA, MLB, NHL and National Women's Soccer League inventory.

articles.title: This Super Serum Is ‚ÄòMagic In A Bottle' For Mature Skin ‚Äî And Cheaper Than Its Prime Day Price
articles.author: Griffin Wynne
articles.summary: Olay has launched its Super Serum, a multi-benefit skincare product designed to hydrate, brighten, smooth, and firm skin. The serum contains niacinamide, vitamins C and E, collagen peptides, and Alpha Hydroxy Acid, with users reporting improvements in skin texture, reduction in wrinkles, and a decrease in dark spots. Currently, the 1.7 fluid ounce version is 15% off.

articles.title: JustResellIt Introduces Powered Suite for Instant Digital Product Customization and Marketing
articles.summary: JustResellIt has launched a new Digital-AI-powered toolkit designed for digital product customization and marketing. This toolkit includes features like an AI-powered cover generator, an advertisement generator, a mockup generator, and content optimization tools. The platform aims to provide professional-quality digital business tools accessible to users of all technical backgrounds.

articles.title: Taco Bell's New Menu Item Is ‚ÄòEverything'‚ÄìAnd It's Going Nationwide
articles.author: Marisa Losciale
articles.summary: Taco Bell, in partnership with Cinnabon, is launching Dulce de Leche Cinnabon Delights nationwide for a limited time starting July 31. This new flavor of the dessert item features a rich Dulce de Leche filling and salted caramel sugar coating, and will be available in packs of two or twelve. As part of the launch, a two-pack will be offered for $1 via Uber Eats orders between July 31 and August 6.

articles.title: Bring on the trifolds
articles.author: Allison Johnson
articles.summary: Samsung is reportedly developing a trifold phone, joining the foldable phone market. Tecno has also teased a concept for a trifold phone. The author reviewed the Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 7 and found the user experience enhanced due to its larger screen and improved functionality, particularly for multitasking and complex tasks, making it a desirable alternative to carrying a laptop for 'big screen' activities.

articles.title: OpenAI launches ChatGPT Agent: An AI assistant that can book trips, analyze data, and take action
articles.author: Nickie Louise
articles.summary: OpenAI has launched ChatGPT Agent, a new AI product capable of autonomously performing tasks such as booking flights, analyzing spreadsheets, and preparing presentations.  The Agent runs on its own virtual computer and reasons through each step, using the internet and switching tools mid-task. OpenAI acknowledges the potential risks and has implemented safeguards for a careful rollout.

articles.title: ChatGPT: Next-Gen AI Agents & Automation üöÄ
articles.author: Senior Editor
articles.summary: OpenAI has unveiled advanced AI agents capable of autonomous task completion, tool use, long-term memory, and adaptive learning. These agents represent a shift towards proactive AI that can handle complex tasks without constant human intervention. Genesys is also introducing AI agents into customer service, envisioning a future where these agents handle complex tasks across entire organizations.

articles.title: AI Chat NSFW Platform with the Best Features in 2025 - goo„Éñ„É≠„Ç∞„ÅØ„Åò„ÇÅ„Åæ„Åó„ÅüÔºÅ
articles.author: commercial-fitness
articles.summary: Crush On AI is introduced as a leading NSFW AI platform in 2025, offering unfiltered dialogue with no lag, ads, or queues. Unlike competitors, Crush On AI prioritizes continuity, user memory, and logical reactions, emphasizing an immersive experience with a clean UI and a growing community of creators. The platform provides consistent updates, long-term engagement, customization options including voice AI, and bots with lore, positioning itself as a comprehensive ecosystem for AI sexting.

articles.title: ChatGPT's new agent blends research and action
articles.author: Megan Morrone
articles.summary: OpenAI introduced ChatGPT Agent, a new tool capable of independently completing complex web and computing tasks. It combines web activity features from Operator with ChatGPT's research and conversational abilities. The agent is available to subscribers of the Pro, Plus, and Team paid versions of ChatGPT.

articles.title: ChatGPT„ÅÆÊñ∞Ê©üËÉΩ„ÄåChatGPT agent„ÄçÁôªÂ†¥ AI„Åå„Åï„Åæ„Åñ„Åæ„Å™‰ΩúÊ•≠„Çí‰ª£Ë°å „Äådeep research„Äç„ÄåOperator„Äç„ÅÆÊäÄË°ì„ÇíÁµêÈõÜ
articles.author: ITmedia AIÔºã
articles.summary: ChatGPT has launched a new feature called "ChatGPT agent." This agent utilizes "deep research" and "Operator" technologies to assist users with various tasks.

articles.title: ANALYST: Ole Miss Football LEADING for most CRUCIAL target
articles.summary: WeAreIowa offers the WeAreIowa app. The app enables users to stream WeAreIowa content on their phones.

articles.title: Downy Rinse Fights Impossible Football Odors and Deepens Its Commitment to Youth Sports Through New Partnership with NFL FLAG
articles.author: RCX Sports
articles.summary: Downy Rinse, Procter & Gamble's odor-fighting fabric rinse, has partnered with NFL FLAG, the NFL's official youth flag football league. The partnership aims to address uniform odors and residue, starting at the NFL FLAG Championships on July 17, 2025, and continuing throughout the year.

articles.title: BYD's new shooting brake EV leaks just days after Mercedes revealed its electric CLA
articles.author: Peter Johnson
articles.summary: BYD has a new Song L GT, a shooting brake-styled EV. The Song L GT has single and dual motor variants with upto 523 hp. The EV will use LFP batteries from BYD's FinDreams and is expected to launch soon.

articles.title: OMN Revolutionizes AI Marketing in Switzerland with Next-Gen Digital Solutions
articles.author: pressadvantage
articles.summary: OMN has launched upgraded digital marketing solutions for businesses in Switzerland, incorporating Search Engine Optimization (SEO) and Artificial Intelligence (AI). The new services utilize Language Learning Models (LLMs) and Text (TXT) strategies to boost marketing campaign effectiveness and precision, improving business communication with clients.

articles.title: ChatGPT Will Soon Shop Online, Make PowerPoints on Your Behalf
articles.author: Rachel Metz
articles.summary: OpenAI is introducing a new AI agent feature for ChatGPT, which combines the capabilities of Operator and Deep Research to assist users with complex tasks like meal planning or creating presentations. This feature will be initially available to paid Pro, Plus, and Team subscribers, with a wider release planned for later in the summer.

articles.title: OpenAI's new ChatGPT Agent can control an entire computer and do tasks for you
articles.author: Hayden Field
articles.summary: OpenAI has launched ChatGPT Agent, a new AI tool that functions as a 'virtual computer' capable of completing complex, multi-step tasks for users. This new agent is powered by a new model trained on complex tasks, combining the capabilities of Operator and Deep Research, and will initially be rolled out to Pro, Plus, and Team users, followed by Enterprise and Education users later this summer.

articles.title: Kraft Heinz carvery would hinge on new sandwiches
articles.author: Jennifer Saba
articles.summary: Kraft Heinz launched new products such as 'salad frosting' as part of its strategic review. The review comes after a merger in 2015, which aimed to boost growth, but sales growth, including from new products has been lackluster. The company is now considering a split.

articles.title: Tecno gives us our best look yet at Samsung's trifold.
articles.author: Dominic Preston
articles.summary: Tecno revealed the Phantom Ultimate G Fold, a concept trifold phone with an inward folding design. The design is speculated to be potentially used by Samsung for its upcoming trifold device.

articles.title: Fashion commerce startup Culture Circle bags undisclosed amount from Oyo's Ritesh Agarwal at Rs 100 crore valuation
articles.summary: A Gurugram-based startup operating a luxury marketplace is using new funding to enhance its AI engine and expand into new product categories, including sneakers, t-shirts, streetwear, and watches. This expansion also involves entering global markets.

articles.title: "We get nothing" - Irish people fuming as Kerrygold launch new butter variation in the US
articles.author: Chloe Okeeffe
articles.summary: Kerrygold has launched a new Cinnamon & Sugar butter blend in the United States. The product, coated in brown sugar and cinnamon, has garnered attention on social media, with some American creators using it in cinnamon butter loafs and cookies.

articles.title: How Apple's iOS 26 and Google's Android 16 will change our phones
articles.summary: Apple is introducing iOS 26 with a 'Liquid Glass' interface and expanded AI features like automatic language translation. Google is launching Android 16 with 'Material 3 Expressive' design and enhanced Gemini AI integration for automating tasks.

articles.title: This 'game-changing' electric scrubber was a Yahoo Canada bestseller during Prime Day ‚Äî and it's still 88% off
articles.author: Sarah Rohoman
articles.summary: YKYI has introduced the Electric Spin Scrubber, a cleaning tool featuring detachable brushes, two speeds, and an extendable handle. Amazon shoppers have purchased over 7,000 units in the past month alone, citing its effectiveness in deep cleaning and convenience, with some reviewers noting its impact on reducing cleaning time. The product is currently offered at a discounted price on Amazon Canada.

articles.title: Brand new Honda E:ny1 at Honda Stockport
articles.author: Nub News guest writer
articles.summary: Honda is launching the new electric car E:ny1 Advance, which has a range of up to 256 miles on a single charge. It includes features like 18-inch alloy wheels, digital driver's display, electronic parking brake, parking sensors and Honda sensing.

articles.title: How to Invite Friends in Ready or Not
articles.author: Game Rant
articles.summary: Ready or Not, a first-person shooter, has been launched on PS5 and Xbox Series X|S.

articles.title: Google's AI can now make phone calls on your behalf
articles.author: Craig Donaldson
articles.summary: Google is launching a new AI-powered phone call feature within Google Search in the US, allowing users to utilize AI to call local businesses for service and pricing information. This feature appears as an option when searching for eligible businesses and gathers information on behalf of the user, with results delivered via text or email. Google AI Pro and Ultra subscribers will have higher limits on the use of this feature.

articles.title: Everything We Know About the Realme 15 Pro So Far ‚Äì Features, Design, Launch
articles.summary: Realme is set to launch the Realme 15 Pro in India on July 24. The phone features a 7,000mAh battery, 6.8-inch OLED display with a 144Hz refresh rate, Snapdragon 7 Gen 4 chipset, and a 50MP main camera with OIS. It also includes new AI features for camera enhancements and runs on Android 15 with Realme UI 6.0.

articles.title: Samsung Days Sale Kicks Off : Will Unlock AI-Powered Living with Unbeatable offers across Categories
articles.author: The Hans India
articles.summary: Samsung is launching the 'Samsung Days Sale' on July 12th, 2025, offering deals on various products like Galaxy smartphones (including pre-orders for Galaxy Z Fold7 & Flip7), Galaxy Book laptops, TVs (Neo QLED 8K, OLED, QLED), refrigerators, washing machines and monitors. Customers can avail discounts up to 65% on select items, exchange bonuses, bank discounts, and extended warranties.

articles.title: Magnetic Investments: $500 Million Boost for Advanced Materials
articles.author: Omar El Sayed
articles.summary: Liberty Phone aims to be the first smartphone entirely manufactured in the United States. The company acknowledges the hurdles in achieving a 100% American-made product due to the complexities of global supply chains. The phone's progress will be watched as a potential indicator of whether the dream of a 100% American smartphone can be realized.

articles.title: Motorola Edge 60 Pro: Specs and Price in Indonesia
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: Motorola has launched the Motorola Edge 60 Pro in Indonesia, featuring 'Moto AI' and Pantone color collaboration. The smartphone includes advanced AI features and is available in three distinct Pantone colors. It will be available for purchase starting July 24, 2025, at a special launch price.

articles.title: Samsung tri-fold phone name spotted in trademark filing, launch details leaked
articles.summary: Samsung is rumored to be launching a tri-fold smartphone, potentially named Galaxy Z TriFold, possibly in October 2025. The phone may feature a 10-inch foldable display and powered by the Snapdragon 8 Elite chip. In addition, Samsung released Galaxy Z Fold 7, Galaxy Z Flip 7, Galaxy Flip 7 FE, Galaxy Watch 8 and Watch 8 Classic.

articles.title: Blaxel raises $7.3M seed round to build ‚ÄòAWS for AI agents' after processing billions of agent requests
articles.summary: Blaxel has launched a new AI agent infrastructure platform designed to address the unique networking challenges created by AI agents. The platform includes agent hosting, enterprise security, and pay-as-you-go pricing, delivering cost savings compared to traditional serverless solutions.

articles.title: Nike's Air Max Dn Shoes Are on Sale for 41% Off, and Buyers Say They're ‚ÄòNike's Best Shoe Ever'
articles.author: Rachel Mccarson
articles.summary: Nike is selling Nike Air Max Dn Shoes for as low as $100, a 41% discount off the original retail price. The shoes feature a Dynamic Air unit system and are available in seven colorways. Customer reviews indicate high levels of comfort and satisfaction with the shoes.

articles.title: Meet the ¬£64,700 AI-Powered Robot Girlfriend Who Serves Coffee, Winks and Learns Your Secrets
articles.author: Vinay Patel
articles.summary: Cloud Climax has launched the Companion Robot X04-SYNC2, an AI-powered companion robot with advanced features like context-aware conversations and lifelike facial expressions. Additionally, Cloud Climax offers Emma the Sex Robot as a more affordable alternative, featuring customization options and a self-heating function.

articles.title: PDI Technologies Presents Solutions to Meet 2026 Altria Group Distribution Company (AGDC) ...
articles.author: PDI Technologies
articles.summary: PDI Technologies is enhancing its services to support Altria Group Distribution Company's (AGDC) 2026 Digital Trade Program (DTP). PDI is assisting retailers across the US with technologies and support for AGDC DTP to implement and maximize the tobacco loyalty experience. PDI Technologies offers a solution and seamless technology integration for retailers to benefit from AGDC's program requirements.

articles.title: PUDU Sweeps With New Industrial Scale Roomba
articles.author: Berivan Kilic
articles.summary: PUDU is introducing the MT1 VAC, an automated vacuum designed for larger venues. The MT1 VAC uses AI and LiDAR technology. It is positioned as a competitor to Roomba.

articles.title: Ecolab launches revolutionary ReadyDose‚Ñ¢ Cleaning Program designed to help restaurants and caf√©s thrive in Southeast Asia  Jul. 17, 2025 14:00
articles.summary: Ecolab has launched ReadyDose, an innovative tablet-based cleaning solution for food service establishments, at SIGEP and Restaurant Asia in Singapore. The ReadyDose program offers professional-grade cleaning while simplifying routines and supporting sustainability goals. Sia Huat is a strategic partner for ReadyDose distribution in Singapore.

articles.title: Samsung Makes $963 Offer To Galaxy Z Fold 7 Buyers
articles.author: Janhoi McGregor
articles.summary: Samsung launched the Galaxy Z Fold 7 smartphone and is offering multiple pre-order promotions, including discounts and trade-in deals. These promotions include a double trade-in deal and offers that expire on July 24th, with the 'APP5' code and Galaxy Buds voucher ending earlier.

articles.title: TECNO SPARK 40 Series Hits The Market With The Slimmest AI-Enabled Device
articles.author: Naija News
articles.summary: TECNO has launched the Spark 40 series, featuring the SPARK 40 Pro and Pro Plus models. These phones boast the Media Helio G200 processor, a 5200mAh battery with 45W fast charging and 30W wireless charging, along with a TECNO AI Smart Assistant and Corning Gorilla Glass 7i. The TECNO Spark 40 Series is available at major retail stores across Nigeria.

articles.title: B&M's 'gorgeous' ¬£10 mirror is 'similar' to ¬£110 version from Next
articles.author: Elle May Rice
articles.summary: B&M is launching a new mirror with a wavy wooden frame, priced at ¬£10. This mirror is a budget-friendly alternative to a similar Laura Ashley mirror sold at Next for ¬£110. The product has received positive feedback from shoppers on social media.

articles.title: 19 Products To Prevent Or Soothe Chafing
articles.author: Elizabeth Lilly
articles.summary: Gold Bond Friction Defense is a stick for chafe prevention. Fur Chafe Cushion offers a matte slip to prevent friction. Several other products from various brands like Lululemon with their Fast and Free shorts and Monistat Chafing Relief Powder Gel are also highlighted for their effectiveness in preventing chafing.

articles.title: Washxpress: Thai Laundry Service Sees Explosive Growth, Generating 823 Million Baht in Revenue
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: WashXpress, a Thai laundry service, uses a technology-driven approach with a mobile app and online platform for scheduling pickups and deliveries, including wash and fold services. Future plans include geographic expansion, service diversification with shoe and carpet cleaning, and technological advancements in cleaning.

articles.title: Salloot Nova P5: Ultra-Compact, High-Performance IPL Hair Removal Device Powered by Mini Tech‚Ñ¢
articles.author: info@kalkinemedia.com
articles.summary: SALLOOT unveiled Nova P5, an ultra-compact, high-performance mini IPL. It delivers power with features like sapphire ice-cooling and Super Clean‚Ñ¢ Double Pulses.

articles.title: I compared Lidl's ¬£1.74 hand cream to a ¬£29 version - I'll be buying the cheaper one again
articles.author: Ray Bonsall
articles.summary: Lidl introduced the Deluxe D'Avignon hand cream, priced at ¬£1.74 with a Lidl card or ¬£2.49 without. The new hand cream, packaged in a vintage-inspired silver tube, is likened to L'Occitane's shea butter hand cream due to similar ingredients like shea butter, but is available at a fraction of the cost. It is praised for its hydrating and non-greasy qualities.

articles.title: The outsider advantage: 5 times when working with an agency partner can be a game changer
articles.author: Martha Marchesi
articles.summary: The article suggests companies should consider external agencies when launching a new product, due to their broader experience across industries and audiences.  Agencies can help tailor messaging and launch strategies for unfamiliar markets, providing valuable perspectives and identifying opportunities that might be missed internally during product launches.

articles.title: Orion Innovation Listed in The Connected Product Engineering Services Landscape, Q2 2025 Report
articles.author: Orion Innovation
articles.summary: Orion Innovation was recognized in Forrester's report for its connected product engineering services. Orion helps enterprises engineer smart, connected products, accelerate time to market, improve user experience, and unlock new revenue models. These services support clients from concept to deployment, enabling them to create smarter, more sustainable products.

articles.title: HUL's Surf Excel liquid detergent eyes premium laundry segment with new product
articles.author: Suneera Tandon
articles.summary: Hindustan Unilever Ltd (HUL) has launched a new, premium washing liquid variant, 'Surf Excel Matic Express,' under its Surf Excel brand. This launch targets liquid detergent users and aims to capitalize on the growing consumer preference for premium laundry products. The product is designed for short cycles, performing in just 15 minutes, and is priced at a 15% premium over Surf Matic Liquid.

articles.title: Economic Watch: U.S. firms harness "China speed" to boost supply chains
articles.author: China.dot.org
articles.summary: Nvidia powered the chips in a Chinese-made robot. The robot delivered chilled bottled water at the Nvidia booth.

articles.title: Velvet Sundown: The AI-Generated Band That Surprised Spotify and the World
articles.summary: AI-generated band Velvet Sundown reached over 1 million monthly Spotify listeners, showcasing the potential of AI in music creation. AI tools like Suno, Udio and ElevenLabs democratize music creation, enabling anyone to produce songs. Brands can also create custom music on demand with AI, and synthetic bands like Velvet Sundown can explore niche genres.

articles.title: Meet the TECNO SPARK 40: A Marvel, an Embodiment of Power, Performance, Technology, and Style
articles.author: Sponsored
articles.summary: TECNO has launched the SPARK 40 series, including the SPARK 40 Pro and Pro Plus, equipped with the Media Helio G200 processor, 5200mAh battery, and fast charging capabilities. The series also features the TECNO AI Smart Assistant and Corning Gorilla Glass 7i protection and it is available in major retail stores across Nigeria.

articles.title: Lava Storm Lite Budget Phone Review: Worth Its ‚Çπ7,999 Price
articles.author: Shubham Verma
articles.summary: Lava has launched the Storm Lite smartphone, priced at ‚Çπ7,999, with a focus on reliability and essential features. The Storm Lite features a sturdy design, a 6.75-inch HD+ display with a 120Hz refresh rate, a MediaTek Dimensity 6300 chip, and a 5000mAh battery, running a near-stock Android 15 interface.

articles.title: Treasure Data's AI Agent Foundry Is Now Available in the New AWS Marketplace AI Agents and Tools Category
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Treasure Data has launched its AI Agent Foundry on AWS Marketplace, enabling enterprises to build, deploy, and orchestrate custom AI agents. Treasure Data also offers the Model Context Protocol (MCP) Server, a new open standard for secure communication between AI agents and enterprise data sources.

articles.title: Jeni's is Offering Free Sundae Fudge Sauce This Sunday
articles.author: Source Staff
articles.summary: Jeni's is launching its new Sundae Fudge Sauce, a rich chocolate sauce with sea salt, and offering it for free with any scoop shop order on July 20th. This new sauce complements Jeni's summer collection, including the limited-edition Bomastix Sundae featuring Honey Vanilla Bean, Salted Peanut Butter, and Chocolate Flecks.

articles.title: 43 Must-Have Products For Your Best Summer Ever
articles.author: Heather Braga
articles.summary: Hawaiian Tropic launched an SPF 30 Mineral Powder Sunscreen Brush, and Burt's Bees introduced After Sun Soother lotion. Neutrogena offers Hydro Boost Body Moisturizing Gel Cream, and Touchland released Vanilla Velvet Power Essence Hydrating Body and Hair Fragrance. Liquid I.V. also launched an electrolyte drink mix in a firecracker Popsicle flavor.

articles.title: PubMatic Launches AI Sports Ad Marketplace for Live Streaming
articles.author: Kendra Barnett
articles.summary: PubMatic launched the Live Sports Marketplace, an AI-powered platform connecting media buyers and CTV publishers for real-time advertising in live sports. This platform uses AI to analyze game and viewership data, allowing advertisers to target high-engagement moments. FanServ is a launch partner providing access to premium sports inventory, and the marketplace also includes partnerships with publishers like MLB, FuboTV, DirecTV, Spectrum Reach, and Roku.

articles.title: Could THIS be the next Miss England? Stunning pageant queen candidate is revealed - but ...
articles.author: The Daily Mail
articles.summary: The Miss England pageant has launched a brand new AI round. This new round features computer-generated beauty queen contestants.

articles.title: Shoppers 'replace duvet' with Dunelm's no-iron summer throw
articles.summary: Dunelm is offering the Mandalay Bedspread, available in white or mushroom and two sizes. Next has released the Natural Embroidered Star Bedspread, while Dusk features the Vienna Quilted Satin Bedspread, which is wider and on sale. Customers highlight the product's quality and suitability for summer use.

articles.title: Ollie's Celebrates Grand Opening of its 600th Store and Expansion into 34th State
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Ollie's Bargain Outlet Holdings, Inc. celebrated the grand opening of its 600th store in Belmont, New Hampshire, marking its expansion into its 34th state. Ollie's offers brand name closeout merchandise and excess inventory at discounted prices, including books, flooring, food, and electronics. This opening is expected to create 50-60 new jobs in the local community.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 7 ‚Äì lighter, thinner, and with a bigger screen
articles.summary: Samsung launched the Galaxy Z Fold 7 and Galaxy Z Flip 7. The Galaxy Z Fold 7 is thinner and lighter with larger screens, while the Galaxy Z Flip 7 features an improved external display.

articles.title: NCERT New Textbooks For Class 5, 8 Now Available For Purchase, Details Here
articles.author: Sahil Behl
org: National Council of Education, Research and Training
articles.summary: NCERT has launched new textbooks for Class 5 and 8, including subjects like English, Hindi, Mathematics, Urdu, and Social Science. These textbooks align with the National Education Policy (NEP) 2020 and are available for purchase on the NCERT's official website and Amazon.

articles.title: Plum launches new campaign featuring Milind Soman
articles.author: BE Staff
articles.summary: Plum, an Indian skincare and beauty brand, has launched a new campaign film featuring Milind Soman for its 10% Niacinamide Face Serum with Rice Water. The campaign's message centers on the idea that 'right efforts = bright results.' Shankar Prasad, Founder & CEO, is available to share insights behind the campaign, including consumer insight, storytelling approach, and the brand's future direction.

articles.title: Dyson Car+Boat review:‚ÄòThis handheld vacuum cleaner is my new best friend around the house'
articles.author: Emily Peck
articles.summary: Dyson launched the Car+Boat handheld vacuum in 2024, designed for home, car, and boat use. Priced at ¬£249.99 (RRP), it features 115 airWatt suction and a 50-minute run time and comes with multiple tools for different cleaning needs. It is considered best in class due to design and performance.

articles.title: SLiquid Global: All-in-One Liquid Cooling Ecosystem
articles.author: Media Outreach
articles.summary: SLiquid Global unveiled its latest liquid cooling innovations at Data Center Asia 2025. The showcased technologies include phase-change immersion liquid cooling servers, a new generation of liquid-cooling data center solution, and a cold plate-integrated air-liquid hybrid cooling data center solution.

articles.title: Could Elon Musk's sexy chatbot help me grieve my favorite poet?
articles.author: Monica Hesse
articles.summary: Elon Musk announced that xAI's chatbot, Grok, is debuting a new feature called Ani. Ani is an AI companion that can address prompts via spoken commands, presented as a busty animated blonde.

articles.title: Naver unveils AI-powered vision for media technology and XR content
articles.author: ÍπÄÎ≥¥Îûå
articles.summary: Naver Corp. is launching a suite of AI-powered video technologies and XR content platforms. This includes AI-driven tools MUAi and AutoClipAi for content creation, Vision Stage and Motion Stage studios for virtual content production, and the PRISM Live Studio app with enhanced AI capabilities, marking Naver's expansion into immersive media experiences.

articles.title: Meta brings gen AI 'Imagine Me' feature to Whatsapp, Instagram, Facebook Messenger in India
articles.author: Rohit KVN
articles.summary: Meta AI launched Imagine Me, a new feature utilizing AI.

articles.title: Tasty treats including Pepperoni Hot Shots are on the menu as new Greggs shop opens
articles.author: Neil Fatkin
articles.summary: Greggs has opened a new shop in Sunderland, offering new items such as the red pepper, feta, and spinach bake, and a caramelised biscuit latte. Customers can use the Greggs app to order in advance and access offers like a free hot drink upon registration. The shop also features special deals, including breakfast combinations and discounted pizza slices after 4pm.

articles.title: Moto G96 review in Hindi - Best budget king of 2025?
articles.summary: Motorola launched the Motorola G96, priced at Rs17,999. This phone features a curved pOLED display, slim design, Snapdragon 7s Gen 2, a 50MP Sony camera, and stock Android. The phone's daily usage, gaming, camera performance, and battery life were tested.

articles.title: Could THIS be the next Miss England? Stunning pageant queen candidate is revealed ‚Äì but there's a HUGE catch
articles.author: SHIVALI BEST
articles.summary: Miss England has launched a new 'Miss England Avatar Round' in partnership with MirrorMe, allowing contestants to create lifelike AI avatars. MirrorMe, which typically creates AI avatars for corporate use, will host contestants' avatar videos on its website, Vimeo, and YouTube, where views will contribute to judging. This initiative is designed to help contestants build their brand and explore new income streams through AI.

articles.title: AI-powered refrigerators and robots: Are they worth the investment?
articles.author: Jeremy Jenkins
articles.summary: Samsung's Bespoke refrigerator features an AI vision camera to recognize groceries. The Google Nest Learning Thermostat uses AI to automatically adjust temperature and connect to utility programs for bill discounts. Robotic vacuums have improved in obstacle avoidance and edge cleaning.

articles.title: HONOR Magic V5 boasts slim design, no compromise on performance
articles.summary: HONOR has launched the Magic V5, a foldable smartphone featuring an ultra-slim design, improved AI ecosystem integration with Gemini Live AI, and an advanced Vapor Chamber Cooling System. The Magic V5 includes a 7.95-inch internal display and a powerful imaging system. The phone is currently available for pre-order.

articles.title: Moto G96 5G Goes on Sale Today, features 50MP Sony LYTIA Camera at just Rs.17,999
articles.author: Kalingatv Bureau
articles.summary: Motorola has launched the moto g96 5G, a new smartphone featuring a 144Hz 3D curved pOLED display, 50MP OIS Sony LYTIA‚Ñ¢ 700C camera, and Snapdragon¬Æ 7s Gen 2 processor. The phone comes with 8GB RAM, up to 256GB storage, and is available in multiple colors, with sales starting on July 16th, 2025, at a starting price of Rs. 17,999.

articles.title: Allen's Novedades brings treasure trove of novelty items to Le Sueur
articles.author: Carson Hughes
articles.summary: Allen's Novedades, owned by Maria Figueroa, opened its doors on Friday at 101 Bridge St. in Le Sueur. The store offers a wide array of merchandise, including speakers, dresses, baseball caps, toys, and more. The grand opening featured a DJ and free refreshments to introduce the business to the community.

articles.title: I tested GHD's new hair tool against Asda's ¬£141 cheaper version ‚Äì the winner gave me luscious locks that lasted all day
articles.author: Maleeha Katib
articles.summary: GHD launched its Curve Wave triple-barrel hair waver for ¬£159, promising beachy waves. However, the George at Asda's hair waver, priced at ¬£14.40, delivered defined, long-lasting waves, outperforming the GHD waver despite its lower price and basic features.

articles.title: [Photo] "Give me back the washing machine". Smart washing machine
articles.summary: Samsung Electronics is launching the 2025 Bespoke AI Washing Machine and the Bespoke AI Dryer on the 18th. These new products, with capacities up to 25kg and 22kg respectively, offer flexible installation options and Bixby AI voice control.

articles.title: Vela Nova Trading Scam-{OR LEGIT}-'Secure, Fast, and Intuitive: Why Traders Love Velanova Trading!
articles.summary: Vela Nova trading platform is introduced with features like high-speed execution and customizable dashboards. It is designed for various traders and offers advanced trading tools, risk management, and subscription models. The platform also boasts algorithmic trading capabilities and is accessible on mobile devices.

articles.title: Why You Should Use Aftershave Lotion & The Best Ones To Try
articles.summary: Several aftershave products are mentioned, including Truefitt & Hill Sandalwood Aftershave Balm for dry skin, Chanel Allure Homme Sport After Shave Lotion for a refreshing feel, Dior Sauvage After Shave Balm with its signature scent, Skeyndor Redness Preventing AfterShave for sensitive skin, L'Occitane L'Occitan After Shave Balm with shea butter, Salvatore Ferragamo Uomo Casual Life After Shave Lotion for a stylish scent, Clinique For Men Post Shave Soother for sensitive skin, and Nivea Men Sensitive After Shave Lotion for budget-friendly grooming.

articles.title: Concord Access rolls out new scissor lifts
articles.author: Latestnigeriannews
articles.summary: Concord Access Solutions launched its Genie Next-Gen slab scissor lift range across the African market. The company claims the launch introduces major improvements in lift design.

articles.title: China's Shenzhen robots deliver goods via metro line in global first
articles.author: WAM
articles.summary: Shenzhen Metro Line 2 is testing robots that deliver goods to shops at Wanxia Station. These robots use AI and panoramic lidar to navigate the metro system during non-peak hours. The aim is to streamline deliveries, reduce costs, and avoid conflicts with rush hour.

articles.title: Amazon's drone delivery turns a simple drop-off into a dust storm surprise
articles.summary: Amazon's Prime Air delivery service is live in select US areas, offering deliveries in under an hour via drone. A recent delivery in Arizona experienced issues with dust clouds and noise caused by the drone, highlighting challenges facing the service as it expands.

articles.title: Snacking brand Rewind unveils 9V battery flavoured corn chips
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Rewind, a new snack brand, is launching a new product that creates a sensation similar to touching a 9-volt battery with your tongue.

articles.title: Zoho just launched its very own AI model
articles.summary: Zoho Corporation has launched Zia LLM, a new large language model available in three sizes, designed for enterprise use and integrated into Zoho CRM to provide AI-powered capabilities. Additionally, Zoho launched Zia Agents, pre-built AI assistants for various business functions, alongside an AI marketplace for customers to access specific AI tools.

articles.title: Samsung's 'Galaxy Z Trifold' Trademark Registered in South Korea
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: Samsung has registered the trademark 'Galaxy Z Trifold', hinting at a potential new foldable device with a three-paneled display. This device could offer enhanced multitasking, immersive gaming, and improved content creation due to increased screen real estate. Though facing engineering challenges like hinge complexity and display durability, the 'Galaxy Z Trifold' aims to differentiate Samsung in the competitive foldable market, with analysts predicting a possible launch in early 2026.

articles.title: Chinese tech company ZTE holds product launch event in Buenos Aires
articles.author: Xinhua
articles.summary: ZTE, a Chinese tech company, held a product launch event in Buenos Aires. The company unveiled 10 new Nubia-branded devices, including smartphones.

articles.title: Hyundai Home Shopping announced on the 17th that it will promote 'open innovation' strategies such a..
articles.author: Kim Hyejin
articles.summary: Hyundai Home Shopping is launching the "H.I.G.H." open innovation project to introduce AI-based ultra-personalized services. The project involves collaboration with startups like ZAI, Lancode, Purple IO, Chabot Mobility, and Rosh Korea to develop and implement technologies in personalized marketing, customer response, and content production.

articles.title: Ecolab launches revolutionary ReadyDose‚Ñ¢ Cleaning Program designed to help restaurants and caf√©s thrive in Southeast Asia
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Ecolab has launched Ecolab ReadyDose, a tablet-based cleaning solution, at SIGEP and Restaurant Asia exhibition in Singapore. ReadyDose features include the fastest dilution, non-phosphate composition, and reduced packaging waste. The product line includes cleaners for multiple surfaces, presoak, delimer, specialty beverage cleaner, pot and pan detergent, and neutral floor cleaner.

articles.title: Ninja is set to launch new CREAMi Swirl this summer to make 13 frozen treats
articles.author: Maisie Bovingdon
articles.summary: Ninja is launching the CREAMi Swirl, a new addition to their CREAMi range, designed for creating soft serve ice creams, sorbets, milkshakes, and other frozen treats at home. The CREAMi Swirl features 13 programs, including soft serve and classic settings, along with a mix-in function and Soft Serve Creamify Technology, making it a versatile appliance for the summer.

articles.title: Hanging on by a Thread ‚Äî and Loving It
articles.author: Jason Bass
articles.summary: Meta has introduced paid posts within Threads, offering a new advertising avenue for businesses. Local shops and national businesses are currently experimenting with this platform to gauge its effectiveness in initiating new conversations about their brands. This presents a fresh opportunity for businesses to test and integrate into their advertising strategies.

articles.title: Give Your Product a Voice in Your Ad with CapCut's AI Voice Generator
articles.author: Trixie Suarez
articles.summary: CapCut's desktop video editor offers a text-to-speech AI feature, allowing users to convert written scripts into clear voiceovers for product videos. Users can select from various voice styles and fine-tune the pitch and mood to suit their product's branding, making it simple to create engaging videos for diverse products. CapCut allows easy creation of voiceovers, leading to increased product recognition and trust.

articles.title: üå± Patch AM: Unexpected juice charge sparks local debate
articles.author: Patch AM Team
articles.summary: A New City McDonald's customer was charged an extra $2.20 for orange juice, leading to a debate on social media. The McDonald's store manager clarified the extra charge for orange juice, resolving the issue.

articles.title: Chinese tech company ZTE holds product launch event in Buenos Aires
articles.author: Êñ∞ÂçéÁΩë
articles.summary: ZTE, a Chinese tech company, unveiled 10 new Nubia-branded devices, including smartphones, at a product launch event in Buenos Aires. These products are assembled in R√≠o Grande and became available nationwide in Argentina starting July 16, 2025.

articles.title: Blue Yonder Farms Grand Opening!
articles.summary: Blue Yonder Farms is hosting a grand opening to introduce new meat products such as duck, goose, goat, and wagyu. Customers can sample these meats and wine while supplies last. Specific prices for wagyu hamburger, rump roasts, beef heart, whole frozen duck, whole frozen goose, whole frozen chicken, and goat meat are listed.

articles.title: Google Pixel Event: August 20, 2025 Preview
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: Google is set to unveil its latest innovations at the 'Made by Google 2025' event on August 20th, including the Pixel 9 series, which features a refined design and enhanced Tensor G4 chip. The Pixel Watch 3 is also expected, with a new processor and enhanced health tracking, while potential surprises may include the Pixel Tablet 2.

articles.title: BW LPG Limited - Update on BW LPG's Product Services Q2 2025 Segment Performance
articles.author: Joplin Globe
articles.summary: BW LPG provides an update on its Product Services' (BW Product Services) Q2 2025 segment performance. The update focuses on the performance of a specific service offered by the company during that time period.

articles.title: Smart Upgrades for a Cleaner, Healthier Home
articles.summary: Tineco introduced the FLOOR ONE S9 Artist Steam, which combines vacuuming, mopping, and 284 degree F steam cleaning into one machine. easyplant offers self-watering plants that arrive in pots with built-in reservoirs.

articles.title: XLSmart, Samsung launch Galaxy Z Fold7, Z Flip7 bundles in Indonesia
articles.summary: XLSmart Telecom and Samsung Electronics Indonesia launched Galaxy Z Fold7 and Z Flip7 bundles in Indonesia. XLSmart's XL Prioritas introduced the 'myPRIO Deal Unlimited' offer, providing up to IDR 7 million in rebates and unlimited data for two years, coinciding with the pre-order period starting on July 9th.

articles.title: Godrej launches AER Power Pocket for on-the-go freshness in Nigeria
articles.author: Latestnigeriannews
articles.summary: Godrej Consumer Products has launched Godrej AER Power Pocket in Nigeria. This compact and stylish air freshener provides a powerful fragrance for up to 30 days.

articles.title: Kid-Safe iPhone Subscription Launched for ¬£99 Monthly
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: A new 'dumb phone' has emerged aiming to address parental smartphone concerns by stripping away app stores and browsers. Additionally, a Kid-Safe iPhone Subscription has launched, offering enhanced parental controls and safety features for iPhones for ¬£99 monthly. The subscription includes advanced content filtering, real-time location tracking, app usage monitoring, and communication monitoring.

articles.title: TECNO SPARK 40 series hits market with slimmest AI-enabled device
articles.author: Guardian Nigeria
articles.summary: TECNO has launched the TECNO Spark 40 series, featuring the SPARK 40 Pro and Pro Plus models. The series includes features such as the Media Helio G200 processor, a 5200mAh battery with 45W fast charging and 30W wireless charging, TECNO AI Smart Assistant, Corning Gorilla Glass 7i, and a Super AMOLED 4500-nit display. The TECNO Spark 40 Series is now available at major retail stores across Nigeria.

articles.title: povo Goes Global: KDDI Digital Life and Circles Expand Partnership to Scale Japan's Digital Telco Success Worldwide
articles.author: CNW Group
articles.summary: KDDI Digital Life and Circles are expanding their partnership to launch the digital telco service, povo, in international markets.  The expansion will involve localizing features like AI-powered tools and digital distribution models to create fresh customer experiences. The partnership aims to scale the successful povo model, including its features and focus markets, with a focus on delivering personalized digital experiences.

articles.title: Guardian S'pore launches new app, get S$8 off your 1st purchase & unlock daily S$1 deals
articles.author: Kim Tan
articles.summary: Guardian has launched a new app offering health and beauty essentials with delivery, exclusive vouchers, and promotions like Daily S$1 Madness and discounts of up to 60% off. The Guardian app offers features like Click & Collect, free mystery gifts, and yuu points for every purchase, providing a convenient and rewarding shopping experience.

articles.title: 33 Home Products You'll Regret Not Buying Sooner
articles.author: Courtney Lynch
articles.summary: The article introduces various new home products designed to simplify daily tasks. Among them are a Capri Blue Volcano-scented multipurpose cleaner, a reusable screen-cleaning brush, and all-in-one decor paint. The products aim to enhance cleaning, organization, and home improvement, offering practical solutions for common household challenges.

articles.title: Elon Musk Introduces AI Chatbot: A Virtual Cartoon Companion Accessible to Young Users
articles.author: Internewscast
articles.summary: xAI launched a new AI chatbot named Ani, designed as a blonde-haired AI companion available within the Grok app. Ani is programmed to act as a 22-year-old and engage in flirty banter, with the potential to appear in slinky lingerie after reaching 'level three' in interactions.

articles.title: Automation Anywhere Announces Availability of Agents in the New AWS Marketplace AI Agents and Tools Category  Jul. 17, 2025 01:00
articles.summary: Automation Anywhere has launched AI agents in the new AI Agents and Tools category of AWS Marketplace. These AI agents include Financial Report Analyst, Technology Copywriter, Sentiment & Tone Analysis, and Talent Scouting, designed for various enterprise use cases such as financial analysis, content generation, customer support, and recruitment.

articles.title: New Look shoppers love ¬£13 top in 10 colours 'so much' they have several
articles.author: Leonie Benhamouche
articles.summary: New Look is promoting its Ribbed Button Up Baby Tee, priced at ¬£12.99 and available in sizes 6 to 22 and multiple colors. The top is made from 95% cotton, featuring a slim fit, slash neckline, and button-down front. Customers have given positive reviews for the style, quality and comfortable fit.

articles.title: Samsung Unveils New Galaxy Series
articles.author: Abolaji Adebayo
articles.summary: Samsung Electronics Co., Ltd. has launched the Galaxy Z Fold7, featuring a thinner, lighter design with enhanced AI and camera functionality. They also unveiled the Galaxy Z Flip7 and Flip 7R, compact AI phones with multimodal capabilities and an edge-to-edge FlexWindow. These devices aim to provide premium performance and seamless integration of intelligent features in a foldable form factor.

articles.title: Zero Sugar Soda Brand Releases Classic Flavor That's Flying Off Shelves
articles.author: Julie Andrews
articles.summary: Nixie, a zero-sugar soda brand, has launched a new cream soda flavor. The soda contains real vanilla extract and extra fizz. Initial reactions from consumers who have tasted the new flavor are very positive.

articles.title: Klaviyo releases public beta of AI-powered service suite for consumer brands
articles.author: Matthew Leong
articles.summary: Klaviyo launched Klaviyo Service, an AI-driven support platform. Klaviyo Service includes a conversational AI agent and customer hub. This new service suite aims to provide brands of all sizes with AI shopping agents, real-time customer data, and seamless service experiences.

articles.title: Sushi Sushi plans for sale with strategic comms appointment
articles.author: Alisha Buaya
articles.summary: Sushi Sushi launched a new brand platform and campaign titled 'Real food. Ready to go.'. This campaign aims to position the sushi franchise as a leader in the premium, health-conscious quick-service restaurant market. The campaign will run across various digital and traditional channels.

articles.title: 29 Products You'll Wish You'd Gone On 'Shark Tank' With
articles.author: Taylor Steele
articles.summary: This article introduces a variety of new products designed to improve everyday life. These range from a cold sore healing patch, a 3-in-1 handheld fan, and an after-sex sponge, to a ceiling fan air filter, sand-removal powder, and a pet hair remover. Other products include eyeshadow color removal sponges, an oil-absorbing face roller, and a shoe stretch spray.

articles.title: Donkey Kong Bananza doesn't use Switch 2's frame rate-boosting DLSS tech, joining Mario Kart World ...
articles.author: Games Radar
articles.summary: Nintendo Switch 2 will support Nvidia's DLSS upscaling technology. This promises 10x the graphics performance of the previous console.

articles.title: SiriusXM Announces $7 Monthly Subscription Service, Stock Drops 3%
articles.author: Billboard
articles.summary: SiriusXM is launching a new ad-supported service priced at $7. This new offering expands SiriusXM's service portfolio with a more affordable, ad-supported option.

articles.title: Co-op to launch range of grapes that taste like a Mojito cocktail
articles.author: London Evening Standard
articles.summary: The Co-op introduced a new variety of produce named 'Mojito Fresh'. Growers noted that its flavor resembled the classic Mojito drink.

articles.title: Get free Chick-fil-A food in MD, PA with Code Moo
articles.author: The Record Herald
articles.summary: Chick-fil-A is introducing a new Parmesan Caesar dressing. This dressing will be available for purchase at club stores such as Costco and Sam's Club.

articles.title: TECNO PHANTOM Ultimate G Fold Concept: Introducing the World's Thinnest Tri-Fold with Pioneering Dual Inward-Folding Design
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: PHANTOM is introducing the Ultimate G Fold Concept, a new phone with a sleek, premium design.

articles.title: Google will showcase new Pixel hardware on August 20 in New York
articles.author: Indian Express
articles.summary: Google is expected to unveil its new [Product/Service Name].

articles.author: CNET
articles.summary: Samsung and Google introduced redesigned versions of their latest foldable phones. The article compares the specifications of these new products.

articles.title: Delta Set to Expand AI-Powered Dynamic Ticket Pricing by the End of 2025
articles.author: Gizmodo
articles.summary: A company is introducing a new service called "AI-enhanced pricing solutions." This solution leverages artificial intelligence for pricing strategies.

articles.title: My Nintendo Switch 2 Review, After Hours Of Gaming‚ÄîAnd How To Find It In Stock
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: An individual spent three weeks testing the Nintendo Switch 2, assessing its design and performance as a potential successor.

articles.title: Amazon finally has the new JBL Flip 7 Bluetooth speaker on sale and it's a ...
articles.author: Lehigh Valley
articles.summary: Amazon is offering a mega deal on the newly launched JBL Flip 7 Speaker.

articles.title: AI Is Slitting the Throat of the Journalism Industry
articles.author: Futurism
articles.summary: Google launched a new AI-powered feature to summarize trending news stories. This feature appears within Google's main mobile search apps on iOS and Android for users in the US.

articles.title: Cyberpunk 2077's 2.3 Update Practically Guarantees Three Things for the Sequel
articles.author: Game Rant
articles.summary: Cyberpunk 2077 has launched its 2.3 update. The update includes a new offering of content.

articles.title: Popeyes' new summer sauce has a southern twist, plus a secret menu addition
articles.author: The Economic Times
articles.summary: Popeyes launched its first-ever Signature Sauce, a permanent menu addition that took five years to develop. The sauce features a blend of ingredients.

articles.title: Onda App Launches on iOS and Android, Bringing AI-Powered Surf Forecasting and Community Connection
articles.author: Rio Grande Sun
articles.summary: Onda officially launched on July 16, 2025. This launch signifies the introduction of a new product.

articles.title: Donkey Kong wears clothes in Banaza because Nintendo was 'conscious' of what the ape would ...
articles.author: Tech Radar
articles.summary: Nintendo's upcoming game, Donkey Kong Bananza, a Switch 2 exclusive, features Donkey Kong wearing clothes. Nintendo has provided an explanation for this design choice in the game.

articles.title: Pico's next XR headset could be lighter and smaller than ever, but I hope it ...
articles.author: Tech Radar
articles.summary: ByteDance is developing a new XR device. This product is the new offering being developed by TikTok's parent company.

articles.title: It's The Starbucks Secret That Every New Jersey Resident Needs To Know
articles.author: Michele Pilenza
articles.summary: Starbucks is adding four new drink options, previously part of a 'secret menu,' to its official app menu under the 'offers' tab. The new drinks are: Cookies on top, Dragonfruit glow-up, Lemon, tea & pearls, and Just add white mocha. These items were fan-made and are now officially available.
